channel.title: Mac Exhaustion on Tristan's website
channel.description: Recent content in Mac Exhaustion on Tristan's website

item.title: Apple this is ridiculous - you gotta upgrade to upgrade!?
item.description: So along with a few folks here around Hopkins we have been kicking around the idea of developing an app for the iPhone/Android. I’ll leave the details out for now (other than to say stay tuned!). But to start developing an app for the iPhone, you need a version of Xcode, Apple’s development environment. The latest version of Xcode is version 4, which can only be installed with the latest version of Mac OS X Lion (10.
